blogPost.excerpt: Imagine selling off all those annual subscriptions you don't use anymore and can't refund. We help you do exactly that. In a nutshell - unloved is a platform for buying and selling pre-owned tech subscriptions.
blogPost.body: Imagine selling off all those annual subscriptions you don't use anymore and can't refund. We help you do exactly that. In a nutshell - unloved is a platform for buying and selling pre-owned tech subscriptions.
blogPost.title: unloved - marketplace for pre-owned tech subscriptions
blogPost.author: Nitish Rathee

localize.description: 想象一下，卖掉所有你不再使用的年度订阅，而且不能退款。我们帮助您做到这一点。简而言之，无人喜爱是一个买卖二手科技订阅的平台。
想象一下，賣掉所有你不再使用的年度訂閱，而且不能退款。我們幫助您做到這一點。簡而言之，無人喜愛是一個買賣二手科技訂閱的平臺。

previous.excerpt: Powered by tens of thousands of popular fully responsive visuals, SYQEL VJ is a simple to use desktop application that enables users to instantly visualize their mic or desktop audio feeds & easily use it as a window source in OBS or other broadcasting apps.
previous.title: SYQEL VJ - Automatic responsive visuals for your streams

localize.description: SYQEL VJ是一款简单易用的桌面应用程序，它能让用户将他们的麦克风或桌面音频馈送即时可视化，并轻松地将其作为OBS或其他广播应用程序的窗口源。
localize.tagline: 为您的流媒体提供自动响应的视觉效果

localize.description: SYQEL VJ是一款簡單易用的桌面應用程序，它能讓用戶將他們的麥克風或桌面音頻饋送即時可視化，並輕鬆地將其作爲OBS或其他廣播應用程序的窗口源。
localize.tagline: 爲您的流媒體提供自動響應的視覺效果

next.excerpt: bilgge is a free service which makes you feel as if you were storing data in a real safe house. instead of saying "it uses end-to-end encryption" then asking you 8+ characters password to protect your data, it gives you power to encrypt your data by yourself in your browser.
next.title: bilgge. - a privacy-paranoid free service for your notes and secrets

localize.tagline: 为您的笔记和秘密提供偏执狂式的免费服务。

localize.description: bilgge是一個免費的服務，讓你感覺就像你在一個真正的安全屋中存儲數據。
localize.tagline: 爲您的筆記和祕密提供偏執狂式的免費服務。
